entry.title: Conducted a 1 Day Git & GitHub Training for IdentLogic Systems
entry.content:
Today, I conducted a 1 Day Git & GitHub Training for IdentLogic Systems.

It was a great experience training the staff of IdentLogic Systems.

Looking forward to provide my training and online training services in Mumbai and overseas.

Regards

Abhishek Luv

entry.title: Conducted One-on-One Git Training for SAP Expert Amol Bhoj
entry.content:
Today, I conducted Git and GitHub training for SAP Expert Amol Bhoj.

It was a great experience training Amol on Git and GitHub.

Training Feedback:

Amazing! It was very informative and useful for me. I liked the hands-on command-line and git extension demos.

Amol Bhoj - SAP Expert

entry.title: Git & Github Free Training in Hindi for Students and Professionals
entry.content:
Welcome to this course on “Learn The Basic’s of Git & GitHub In Hindi”.

Note : This Free Course is in Hindi Language and Not English.

What is the course about?

  • Learn about Git
  • Learn about Git Command-Line Tool
  • Learn about Msysgit & Git Extensions Software
  • Learn about Git Commands
  • Learn about GitHub

What things you’ll be learning in this course?

  • What is Git and GitHub
  • Git Concepts
  • File Management and Index
  • Git Commands
  • Initializing a Local Git Repository
  • Configuring Remote Repository
  • Adding files to a Repo
  • Committing changes
  • Pushing Changes to GitHub
  • Adding a .gitignore file
  • Creating a Branch
  • Switching Between Branches
  • Merging Branches
  • Push local changes after merging
  • Generating SSH Key for GitHub
  • GitHub : Forks
  • GitHub : Pull Requests
  • GitHub : Cloning

Who should take this course?

  • College Students
  • Computer Science Students
  • Novice Software Developers
  • Anybody interested in learning Git & GitHub

What are the requirements?

  • Basic Knowledge of Windows PC
  • Tech Savvy Person

What am I going to get from this course?

  • Learn about Git
  • Learn about Git Command-Line Tool
  • Learn about Msysgit & Git Extensions Software
  • Learn about Git Commands
  • Learn about GitHub

What is the target audience?

  • College Students
  • Computer Science Students
  • Novice Software Developers
  • Anybody interested in learning Git & GitHub

PDF Download

Download Git and GitHub Training Material

Git and GitHub Course Intro

What is Git and GitHub

GitHub Registration and Creating a GitHub Repository

What is a Repository, Git Object Store and Index

File Management and Index

Installing MSysGit and Git Extension

Git Basic Commands

Initializing a Local Git Repository

Configuring Remote Git Repository

Git Remote and Git Remote Remove

Adding a File to the Local Repository and Git Status

Removing a file from Index

Adding a .gitignore file

Configuring the Global Commit Author

Committing changes Initial Commit

Git Log Command

Git and GitHub Training In Hindi: Pushing Changes to GitHub

Git and GitHub Training In Hindi : Generating SSH Key for GitHub

Git and GitHub Training In Hindi : Create and Checkout a New Git Branch

Git & GitHub Training In Hindi : Merging Branches

Git & GitHub Training In Hindi : GitHub Cloning

Git & GitHub Training In Hindi : GitHub Fork

Git & GitHub Training In Hindi : GitHub Pull Requests
